data.title: Valis: The Fantasm Soldier Collection
data.meta_description: VALIS: The Fantasm Soldier is a side scrolling action title originally released by Telenet Japan in 1986 for PCs. It features a heroine who dawns a bikini sailor outfit and uses her sword to take down demons all on her own. The game offers satisfying action and a compelling story that have won over many fans in the 35 years since the original release.
